content.text: Melissa Hudson is a fictional character played by Jazz Raycole in The Office. She is Stanley Hudson daughter.

Melissa is Stanley Hudson's daughter; in the episode Take Your Daughter To Work Day, she develops a crush on Ryan, asks him about going to a coffee shop named "Jitterz" and asks him to give her his email address. Later her father yells at Ryan and tells him to stay away from her because according to Stanley “That little girl is a child”.
She returns briefly in Free Family Portrait Studio and takes a picture with her father.

elements.text: It was said that she currently in grade eight, however, Jazz Raycole, the actress who played her, was 18 years old when the episode was filmed.
